text.0:
A press release shared on Twitter claiming that the Tanzania Women Lawyers Association has condemned opposition politician Tundu Lissu’s remarks on homosexuality is :cross_mark: FALSE.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: The association disowned the claim, calling the document fake: https://t.co/TXtRY6JNtw
text.1:
:police_car_light: HOAX: A Facebook post with a screenshot of a CNN broadcast whose text claims Uganda’s president may not have academic documents is fake.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: The screenshot has been doctored and has inconsistent fonts as well as grammatical errors: https://t.co/ZddnZZDjiP
text.2:
A tweet supposedly posted by Uganda's deputy police spokesperson claiming that a fire at Makerere University destroyed the president's academic documents is :cross_mark: FALSE.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: The account impersonates Polly Namaye, and @PoliceUg have called it fake: https://t.co/JPKDybcbqp
text.3:
A Facebook post claiming that human rights activist Okiya Omtatah has gone to court to challenge the decision by Kenya's Education Ministry to reopen schools on October 12 is :cross_mark: FALSE.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: Mr Omtatah told us the claim was untrue: https://t.co/0OracnUEh8
text.4:
:police_car_light: HOAX: A Facebook post claiming that Nairobi's governor is offering 15 people KSh 35,000 each in cash assistance is fake.

:warning_selector: Governor Sonko’s official Facebook page has no information on the giveaway, and his office has disowned the post: https://t.co/DLJaAJaanu
text.5:
:police_car_light: HOAX: An infographic shared on Facebook purportedly from the World Health Organisation and claiming it has outlined “brain-damaging habits” is fake.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: @WHO has distanced itself from the infographic, and the claims made in it are also false: https://t.co/XPifTwmjaO
text.6:
A tweet claiming that Kenya's Health Ministry has banned the LYFT brand of nicotine pouches is :cross_mark: FALSE.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: While Cabinet Secretary Mutahi Kagwe has not issued such a ban, he has questioned the product's licensing by the Pharmacy and Poisons Board: https://t.co/Juj2QClhAq
